thread.title: 10 things you need to know about Hearts' new coach
thread.title_full: 10 things you need to know about Hearts' new coach

title: 10 things you need to know about Hearts' new coach
text:
Sports News | 26 October 2015 12:06 CET 10 things you need to know about Hearts' new coach By MyJoyOnline 
Hearts of Oak are set to appoint 46 year old Japanese Kenichi Yatsuhashi as coach. The Japanese is relatively unknown on the continent and his appointment still comes as a surprise to many. 
Who is this Japanese and what are some basic facts about him? 
1. Mr. Yatsuhashi played football professionally for a Division II team in Brazil. 
2. Kenichi was born in the United States of America. 
3. He has been residing in Brooklyn New York but spends some time in Japan for holidays. 
4. Kenichi Yatsuhashi was the head coach of male and female ASA college (equivalent to university in the country) football team for a period of five years. 
5. Yatsuhashi speaks two main languages; English and Japanese. 
6. Kenichi is active on social media and has been actively updating his twitter, facebook and Instagram accounts. 
7. Kenichi is renowned youth coach and his coaching stints have been with youth and junior sides. 
Story by Ghana/Joy Sports/Kweku Arhin
